name: Realtor Express
author: Pulsar Web Design

sections.description:
Realtor Express is a WordPress plugin designed specifically for realtors. By employing a simple and intuitive user interface, clean shortcodes, and a number of useful widgets the plugin provides maximum speed and agility when developing real-estate websites.

For more information, check out pulsarwebdesign.com/realtor-express.

Main Features

  • Simple and intuitive user interface.
  • Listings management using WordPress internal post management system.
  • Real time address validation using Google Maps API.
  • Listings filter (search) widget.
  • Mini-map widget.
  • Interactive multi-map.
  • Manage each listing’s gallery using WordPress built in media manager.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire realtor-express folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

For basic usage, check the plugin documentation page or have a look at the plugin homepage. For a live demonstration visit rex.pulsarwebdesign.com.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Fixed issue with listings filter.
  • Fixed compatibility issue with WordPress 3.5.

1.0.3

  • Fixed some minor lightbox issues.
  • Fixed address validation issue.

1.0.2

  • Fixed thumbnails issue.

1.0.1

  • Fixed bug which caused an error message upon activation.
  • Fixed issue where some lightbox images (such as the close button) were missing.

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Easy, fast, and simple listings management for realtors.
